test.query: select {[Measures].[Amount USD ShpLvL],[Measures].[FFE Discharged],[Measures].[FFE Loaded]} on 0 from [PnL Cube]
select {[Measures].[Amount USD ShpLvL],[Measures].[FFE Discharged],[Measures].[FFE Loaded]} on 0, [Time Accounting period].[Unique Month].Children on 1 from [PnL Cube]
select {[Measures].[Amount USD ShpLvL],[Measures].[FFE Discharged],[Measures].[FFE Loaded]} on 0, non empty [String].[String].Children on 1 from [PnL Cube]
